short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight posts containing specified keywords on Twitter and LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As soon as some big event happens in the world, suddenly everyone wants to talk about it. And for quite some days, your LinkedIn and Twitter feeds remain filled with such buzz.
You may wish to follow or skip the buzz. 
This extension takes buzzwords as input and highlights the posts containing those so you can spot them beforehand and choose to read or skip them.
Happy surfing!
